section:
&reftitle.runtime;
mecab runtime configuration
directive default value descrpition
default_rcfile
Definition for directive "mecab.default_rcfile". Specifies the path of the resource file which is used by default.
default_dicdir
Definition for directive "mecab.default_dicdir". Specifies the path of the system dicdir which is used by default.
default_userdic
Definition for directive "mecab.default_userdic". Specifies the path of the user dictionary which is used by default.
internal_encoding UTF-8 Definition for directive "mecab.internal_encoding". Specifies the encoding of the Unicode converter which is used to convert Unicode string between binary string.
